com.threerings.jpkg.ant.dpkg.dependencies
Interface PackageInfoDependency

All Superinterfaces:
Field, ReferenceField, RequiresValidation
All Known Implementing Classes:
Alternatives, BaseDependency, Conflict, Replacement, Require
public interface PackageInfoDependency
extends ReferenceField

A ReferenceField which can add itself to a PackageInfo object as an AbstractDependency type.
